QuestData.Title: Kick Them While They're Down
QuestData.Description: The news you've discovered is fortunate, $n. Not only do you get to waltz into Manaforge Duro unfettered, this also presents a great opportunity to deal a blow to Kael's army.$B$BUse the mana creature assault to your advantage and pick off any Sunfury stragglers you run into.$B$BI do not take particular glee in the senseless slaughter of my own kin the way that Thalodien does, but the tactical advantage here is too high to pass up.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 8 Sunfury Conjurers, 6 Sunfury Bowmen and 4 Sunfury Centurions. Return to Magistrix Larynna at Area 52 after completing this task.$B$BCompleting tasks for the Scryers will cause your Aldor reputation to decrease.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done well, $n. Kael's army will not easily recover from the blow you've dealt today.
